title: Actual service process - Business rules
content:
The actual service workflow relies on a simple business rule that applies to all phases:

  • Plan
  • Build
  • Operate
  • Decommission
  • Retired
Event Condition Service Management action
After change If Missing = true
  • Adds a comment to the record that the system element is missing.
  • Sends an email to the Owner that the system element is missing.

Related topics

  • Actual services
  • Actual service workflow
  • Processes and Rules
